dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Uch ôch...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Is everything ok?
dialogue.translation: Wszyjsko ok?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: No! We've hit some kind of interference...
dialogue.translation: Niy! Trefili my na jakeś turbacyje...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Something's wrong! We're going to crash!
dialogue.translation: Cosik niy pasuje! Zarŏzki sie roztrzaskōmy!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.translation: Ewakuôwać sie!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ôch niy!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Everyone off the ship!
dialogue.translation: Wszyjscy raus ze szifa!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This shouldn't be happening!
dialogue.translation: To sie niy śmiy dziŏć!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Phew! That was scary!
dialogue.translation: Uff! To było ôkropiczne!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: At least we all escaped, right guys?
dialogue.translation: Na kōniec my wszyjscy pitli, pra kamraty?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder why the ship teleported me here alone?
dialogue.translation: Dziwuja sie, po jakimu szif teleportowoł sam ino mie?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope everyone else got out ok...
dialogue.translation: Ufōm, co wszyjscy wyleźli z tego ok...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Violet! Is that you?
dialogue.translation: Violet! Je żeś to ty?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Je żeś ok?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Something has gone horribly wrong with the ship's teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Cosik poszło pierōnym źle z teleporterym ôd szifa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think everyone has been teleported away randomly! They could be anywhere!
dialogue.translation: Miynia se, co wszyjscy sie teleportowali bez cufal! Poradzōm być leda kaj!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ôch niy!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm on the ship - it's damaged badly, but it's still intact!
dialogue.translation: Je żech na szifie - je ôn fest felerny, ale durś sprŏwny!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Where are you, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Kaj żeś je, Kapitanie?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I'm on some sort of space station... It seems pretty modern...
dialogue.translation: Je żech na keryś kosmicznyj szteli... Zdŏwo sie doś moderno...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There seems to be some sort of interference in this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Zdo sie, co je to zorta turbacyji w tym wymiarze...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm broadcasting the coordinates of the ship to you now.
dialogue.translation: Posyłōm Ci terŏzki koôrdynaty ôd szifa.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I can't teleport you back, but...
dialogue.translation: Niy poradza Cie teleportować nazŏd, ale...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If YOU can find a teleporter anywhere nearby, you should be able to teleport back to me!
dialogue.translation: Kejbyś kajś po blisku wysznupoł teleporter, poradził byś sie nazŏd do mie teleportować!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll try to find one!
dialogue.translation: Ok! Postarōm sie taki znojś!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Good luck, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Niych Ci sie darzy, Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll keep trying to find the rest of the crew...
dialogue.translation: Byda dalij sznupała za resztōm ekipy...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if no trinkets found yet

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Ohh! I wonder what that is?
dialogue.translation: Ôchh! Dziwuja sie co to je?

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Zdo sie, co mi ônego tak richtich niy trza, ale było by fajnie wziōńś ônego nazŏd na szif, do uczynio sie...

cutscene.explanation: player finds Trench Warfare trinket, if other trinket already found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Oh! It's another one of those shiny things!
dialogue.translation: Ôch! To je jeden ze tych błyskajōncych dinksōw!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I probably don't really need it, but it might be nice to take it back to the ship to study...
dialogue.translation: Zdo sie, co mi ônego tak richtich niy trza, ale było by fajnie wziōńś ônego nazŏd na szif, do uczynio sie...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: A teleporter!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I can get back to the ship with this!
dialogue.translation: Poradza z tym przijś nazŏd na szif!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, Doctor - have you any idea what caused the crash?
dialogue.translation: Tŏż, Dochtor Violet - wiycie kaj je powōd kraksy?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's some sort of bizarre signal here that's interfering with our equipment...
dialogue.translation: Sam je jakisik dziwny sygnŏł, kery zawŏdzo fōngowaniu naszych klamorōw...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It caused the ship to lose its quantum position, collapsing us into this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Sprŏwiło to, co szif stracił swoja kwantowo pozycyjo, co nŏs wciepło do tego wymiaru!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ôch niy!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: But I think we should be able to fix the ship and get out of here...
dialogue.translation: Ale zdo mi sie, co poradzymy zreperować szif i wylyź z tego...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... as long as we can find the rest of the crew.
dialogue.translation: ... ô wiela poradzymy znojś reszta ekipy.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We really don't know anything about this place...
dialogue.translation: Tak richtich to nic niy wiymy ô tym placu...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Our friends could be anywhere - they could be lost, or in danger!
dialogue.translation: Nasze kamraty poradzōm być leda kaj - poradzōm sie stracić i być zagrożyni!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Can they teleport back here?
dialogue.translation: Poradzōm sie ôni nazŏd tukej teleportować?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Not unless they find some way to communicate with us!
dialogue.translation: Niy, dokej znojdōm jakiś knif, coby sie z nami dogŏdać!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We can't pick up their signal and they can't teleport here unless they know where the ship is...
dialogue.translation: Niy poradzymy chycić ôd ônych sygnału, a ôni niy bydōm poradzili sie sam teleportować, dokej niy bydōm wiedzieć kaj je szif...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So what do we do?
dialogue.translation: Tōż co bydymy robić?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We need to find them! Head out into the dimension and look for anywhere they might have ended up...
dialogue.translation: Muszymy ônych znojś! Wyruszyć w głōmb wymiaru i sznupać kaj ino ôni poradzōm być...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! Where do we start?
dialogue.translation: Ok! Kaj sztartujymy?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Well, I've been trying to find them with the ship's scanners!
dialogue.translation: No, prōbowała żech ônych znojś bez skanery ôd szifa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: It's not working, but I did find something...
dialogue.translation: Niy funguje, ale cosik żech wysznupała...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: These points show up on our scans as having high energy patterns!
dialogue.translation: Te pōnkty, co pokŏzujōm sie na naszych skanach, sōm fest energetyczne!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: There's a good chance they're teleporters - which means they're probably built near something important...
dialogue.translation: Je fest szansa, co to sōm teleportery - co bodej ôznaczo, iże pobudowano ône kole czegoś wŏżnego...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: They could be a very good place to start looking.
dialogue.translation: Ône poradzōm być dobrym placym coby sztarnōńć sznupanie.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok! I'll head out and see what I can find!
dialogue.translation: Ok! Wyleza i ôbejrza co poradza znojś!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Byda tukej, kej bydzie Ci trza pōmocy!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll be right here if you need any help!
dialogue.translation: Byda tukej, kej bydzie Ci trza pōmocy!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm feeling a bit overwhelmed, Doctor.
dialogue.translation: Czuja sie kapka markotny, Dochtor Violet.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where do I begin?
dialogue.translation: Kaj mōm napocznōńć?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press ENTER to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Spamiytej, co idzi naciś ENTER coby wybadać kaj żeś je na mapie!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Remember that you can press {b_map} to check where you are on the map!
dialogue.translation: Spamiytej, co idzi naciś {b_map} coby wybadać kaj żeś je na mapie!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look for areas where the rest of the crew might be...
dialogue.translation: Posznupej za placami, na kerych poradzi być reszta ekipy!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you get lost, you can get back to the ship from any teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Kej sie stracisz, poradzisz przijś nazŏd na szif z leda kerego teleportu.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: And don't worry! We'll find everyone!
dialogue.translation: I niy starej sie! Znojdymy kŏżdego!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Wszyjsko bydzie ok!

cutscene.explanation: only one player string is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Z wami wszyjsko ok, Kapitanie?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Victoria, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Starōm sie ô Victoria, Dochtor Violet!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vitellary, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Starōm sie ô Vitellary'ego, Dochtor Violet!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Verdigris, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Starōm sie ô Verdigrisa, Dochtor Violet!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about Vermilion, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Starōm sie ô Vermiliona, Dochtor Violet!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm worried about you, Doctor!
dialogue.translation: Starōm sie ô Ciebie, Dochtor Violet!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh - well, don't worry, they'll show up!
dialogue.translation: Ôch - ja, niy starej sie, pokŏżōm sie!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Here! Have a lollipop!
dialogue.translation: Tukej! Weź se lizŏk!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store anything I find out there...
dialogue.translation: Zdo mi sie, co to je akuratny plac na trzimanie wszyjskigo co hań wysznupia...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Victoria rada sztudiyruje interesantne rzeczy, kere znojdymy na naszych przigodach!

cutscene.explanation: if at least one trinket found

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: This seems like a good place to store those shiny things.
dialogue.translation: Zdo mi sie, co to je akuratny plac na trzimanie tych dinksōw.

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Victoria loves to study the interesting things we find on our adventures!
dialogue.translation: Victoria rada sztudiyruje interesantne rzeczy, kere znojdymy na naszych przigodach!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Ufōm co nic ônyj niy ma...

cutscene.explanation: nuance: `she's BACK on the ship` means more `she's home` and not `she has returned to the ship`. She has never left the ship

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been so worried!
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Fest żech sie staroł!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Inżinierze Verdigrisie! Nic Ci niy ma?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I've been trying to get out, but I keep going around in circles...
dialogue.translation: Prōbowoł żech wylyź, ale durch ôbrŏcōm sie doôbkoła...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I've come from the ship. I'm here to teleport you back to it.
dialogue.translation: Prziszoł żech ze szifa. Je żech sam, coby Cie nazŏd teleportować.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Is everyone else alright? Is Violet...
dialogue.translation: Sōm wszyjscy inksi doporzōndku? Je Violet....

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine - she's back on the ship!
dialogue.translation: Nic ônyj niy ma - je nazŏd na szifie!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh! Great - Let's get going, then!
dialogue.translation: Ôch! Super - tōż idymy!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! Captain! Are you stuck here too?
dialogue.translation: Ôch niy! Kapitanie! Tyś tyż sam utknył?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's ok - I'm here to rescue you!
dialogue.translation: Ok - je żech sam coby Cie uratować!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let me explain everything...
dialogue.translation: Dej mi wszyjsko wyklarować.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? I didn't understand any of that!
dialogue.translation: Co? Nic żech z tego niy spokopiła!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... well, don't worry.
dialogue.translation: Ôch... nō, niy starej sie.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! Everything will be alright!
dialogue.translation: Idź za mnōm! Wszyjsko bydzie doporzōndku!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Sniff... Really?
dialogue.translation: Chlip... Richtich?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Tōż ok!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Am I ever glad to see you! I thought I was the only one to escape the ship...
dialogue.translation: Je żech rŏd, co Cie rŏz za kej widza! Myśloł żech, co ino jo jedyn uciyk ze szifa...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion! I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Vermilion! Wiedzioł żech, co bydziesz ok!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: So, what's the situation?
dialogue.translation: Tōż, jako je sytuacyjo?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I see! Well, we'd better get back then.
dialogue.translation: Widza! Tōż sie lepij wrōcymy.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: There's a teleporter in the next room.
dialogue.translation: W dolszyj izbie je teleport.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, Viridian! You got off the ship alright too?
dialogue.translation: Ach, Viridian! Tyś tyż doporzōndku zeszeł ze szifa?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's good to see you're alright, Professor!
dialogue.translation: Je żech rŏd, coście sōm ok, Profesorze!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Is the ship ok?
dialogue.translation: Szif je ok?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's badly damaged, but Violet's been working on fixing it.
dialogue.translation: Je fest felerny, ale Violet przi tym robi.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We could really use your help...
dialogue.translation: Nōm richtich nado sie twoja pōmoc...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, of course!
dialogue.translation: Ach, toć!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: The background interference in this dimension prevented the ship from finding a teleporter when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Turbacyje we tle tego wymiaru, niy dozwoliły coby szif znŏd teleporter, kej my sie roztrzaskali!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We've all been teleported to different locations!
dialogue.translation: Wszyjscy ôstali my teleportowani na roztomajte place!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Er, that sounds about right!
dialogue.translation: Ech, to brzmi prawie dobrze!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's get back to the ship, then!
dialogue.translation: Tōż, pōdźcie nazŏd na szif!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Za tobōm Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Łaaaa!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Are you ok?
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Je żeś ok?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I'm ok... this... this isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Je żech ok... to... to niy je nasz szif...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Kaj my sōm?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Łaaaa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Something's gone wrong... We should look for a way back!
dialogue.translation: Cosik poszło niyfajnie... Muszymy znojś drōga nazŏd!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me! I'll help you!
dialogue.translation: Pōdź za mnōm! Jo Ci pōmoga!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Promise you won't leave without me!
dialogue.translation: Ôbiecej co niy wyleziesz bezymie!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I promise! Don't worry!
dialogue.translation: Ôbiecuja! Niy starej sie!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you ok down there, Doctor?
dialogue.translation: Je Ci sam ok na spodku, Dochtor Victoria?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wanna go home!
dialogue.translation: Chca iś do dōm!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Where are we? How did we even get here?
dialogue.translation: Kaj żeś je? Jak my sie tukej tak richtich dostali?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Well, Violet did say that the interference in the dimension we crashed in was causing problems with the teleporters...
dialogue.translation: Nō, Violet pedziała, co turbacyjo we wymiarze w kerym my sie roztrzaskali, zrobiła problymy z teleporterami...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I guess something went wrong...
dialogue.translation: Zdo mie sie, co cosik poszło felernie...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: But if we can find another teleporter, I think we can get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Ale kej wysznupiymy inkszy teleport, zdo mi sie co wrōcymy na szif!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Captain! Wait for me!
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Kapitanie! Doczkej na mie!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Please don't leave me behind! I don't mean to be a burden!
dialogue.translation: Prosza niy ôstawiej mie! Niy chca być ciynżarym!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm scared!
dialogue.translation: Mōm stracha!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh... don't worry Victoria, I'll look after you!
dialogue.translation: Ôch... niy starej sie Victoria, byda Cie pilnowoł!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're never going to get out of here, are we?
dialogue.translation: Nigdy stōnd niy wylezymy, pra?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I.. I don't know...
dialogue.translation: Jo... Jo niy wiym...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know where we are or how we're going to get out...
dialogue.translation: Niy wiym kaj my sōm|i jak stōnd wylezymy...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: We're going to be lost forever!
dialogue.translation: Bydymy na zŏwdy stracyni!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok, come on... Things aren't that bad.
dialogue.translation: Ok, dej pokōj... Niy ma tak źle.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I have a feeling that we're nearly home!
dialogue.translation: Zdo mi sie co my już sōm hned w dōma!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We can't be too far from another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Niy mogymy być za daleko ôd inkszego teleportera!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope you're right, captain...
dialogue.translation: Ufōm, co mosz recht, kapitanie...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! You were right! It's a teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Mosz recht! To je teleporter!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Phew! You had me worried for a while there... I thought we were never going to find one.
dialogue.translation: Uff! Bez chwila żeś mie szterowała... Myśloł żech, co nigdy żodnego niy znojdymy.

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What? Really?
dialogue.translation: Co? Doprŏwdy?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Anyway, let's go back to the ship.
dialogue.translation: Sōuwisōu, pōdźmy nazŏd na szif...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Huh? This isn't the ship...
dialogue.translation: Ha? To niy je tyn szif...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain! What's going on?
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Co sie robi?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I... I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Jo... Jo nic niy wiym!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Kaj my sōm?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Uh oh, this isn't good... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Uch ôch, to niy ma dobrze... Cosik sie musiało popsuć w teleporterze!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok... no need to panic!
dialogue.translation: Ok... niy trza nōm paniki!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's look for another teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Posznupejmy za inkszym teleporterym!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go this way!
dialogue.translation: Pōdźmy hań!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: After you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Za tobōm, Kapitanie!

cutscene.explanation: just like in rescuegreen, `Violet is back on the ship` does not mean she was ever off the ship and has *returned* to it. Or maybe Verdigris thinks Violet was warped off the ship as well just like him and she *has* made her way back to the ship?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So Violet's back on the ship? She's really ok?
dialogue.translation: Tōż Violet je nazŏd na szife? Doprŏwdy je śniōm ok?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: She's fine! She helped me find my way back!
dialogue.translation: Śniōm je ok! Dopōmōgła mi znojś drōga nazŏd!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Oh, phew! I was worried about her.
dialogue.translation: Ôch uff! Staroł żech sia ô nia!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Captain, I have a secret...
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Mōm sekret...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I really like Violet!
dialogue.translation: Jo mōm Violet richtich rŏd!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is that so?
dialogue.translation: Je to prŏwda?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Please promise you won't tell her!
dialogue.translation: Prosza ôbecej, co ônyj niy powiysz!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hey again!
dialogue.translation: Hej drugi rŏz!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Are you doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Idzie Ci ok?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think so! I really hope we can find a way back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Myśla, co ja! Richtich ufōm, co znojdymy drōga na szif...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: So, about Violet...
dialogue.translation: Tōż, co do Violet...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um, yeah?
dialogue.translation: Ô, ja?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Do you have any advice?
dialogue.translation: Mosz jako dorada?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: Ôch!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Um... you should... be yourself!
dialogue.translation: Nō... trza coś był sobōm!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.translation: Ôch.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Thanks Captain!
dialogue.translation: Dziynki Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: So, do you think you'll be able to fix the ship?
dialogue.translation: Tōż, zdo Ci sie co poradzisz zreperować szif?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Depends on how bad it is... I think so, though!
dialogue.translation: Bydzie podug tego jak je źle... Miynia se, co ja!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It's not very hard, really. The basic dimensional warping engine design is pretty simple, and if we can get that working we shouldn't have any trouble getting home.
dialogue.translation: Tak richtich, to niyma fest ciynżke. Bazowo kōnstrukcyjo motoru co wykrziwio wymiary je ajnfachowo, i kej podarzi sie nōm ôn ruszyć, to niy bydymy mieć problymōw z dojściym do dōm.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh! Good!
dialogue.translation: Ôch! Fajnie!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Finally! A teleporter!
dialogue.translation: Antlich! Teleporter!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I was getting worried we wouldn't find one...
dialogue.translation: Już żech sie boł, co ônego niy znojdymy...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's head back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Pōdźmy nazŏd na szif!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Wow! Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Ôł! Kaj my sōm?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This... isn't right... Something must have gone wrong with the teleporter!
dialogue.translation: To... niy ma dobrze... Cosik sie musiało popsuć w teleporterze!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Oh well... We can work it out when we get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Nō ja... wyklarujymy to, kej przidymy nazŏd na szif!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's go exploring!
dialogue.translation: Wyklarujmy to!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Ok then!
dialogue.translation: Tōż ok!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Pōdźcie za mnōm!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Aye aye, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Ja ja, Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Viridian... how did the crash happen, exactly?
dialogue.translation: Hej Viridianie... jak po prŏwdzie prziszło do kraksy?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh, I don't really know - some sort of interference...
dialogue.translation: Ôch, jo richtich niy wiym -|- jakoś turbacyjo...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...or something sciencey like that. It's not really my area.
dialogue.translation: ...abo cosik takigo po naukowymu. To po prŏwdzie niy je mōj plac.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Ah! Well, do you think we'll be able to fix the ship and go home?
dialogue.translation: Ach! Tōż, zdo Ci sie co poradzymy zreperować szif i pojechać do dōm?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Of course! Everything will be ok!
dialogue.translation: Sie wiy! Wszyjsko bydzie ok!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hi again! You doing ok?
dialogue.translation: Hej zajś! Idzie Ci fajnie?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I think so! But I really want to get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Myśla co ja! Ale doprŏwdy chca wrōcić nazŏd na szif...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll be ok! If we can find a teleporter somewhere we should be able to get back!
dialogue.translation: Bydzie ok! Kej znojdymy kajś teleporter muszymy poradzić wrōcić!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Are we there yet?
dialogue.translation: Sōm my już hań?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're getting closer, I think...
dialogue.translation: Myśla, co my sōm corŏzki bliżyj?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I hope...
dialogue.translation: Ufōm...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I wonder where we are, anyway?
dialogue.translation: Krōm tego, medykuja kaj my sōm?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: This seems different from that dimension we crashed in, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Zdŏwo sie, co to je inksze co wymiar, w kerym my sie roztrzaskali, jakosik...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I dunno... But we must be close to a teleporter by now...
dialogue.translation: Niy wiym... Ale my muszymy być terŏzki po blisku teleporteru...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We're there!
dialogue.translation: Sam my sōm!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: See? I told you! Let's get back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Widzisz? Gŏdoł żech Ci! Pōdźmy nazŏd na szif!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oooh! This is interesting...
dialogue.translation: Ôooch! To je interesantne...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you been here before?
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Był żeś sam już kejś przōdzij?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Where are we?
dialogue.translation: Co? Kaj my sōm?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I suspect something deflected our teleporter transmission! This is somewhere new...
dialogue.translation: Miynia se, co cosik skrziwiło nasza transmisyjo teleportacyjno! To je kajś indzij.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ôch niy!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We should try to find a teleporter and get back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Trza coby my sprōbowali znojś teleporter i wrōcić na szif...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Follow me!
dialogue.translation: Pōdźcie za mnōm!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Right behind you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Dyrekt za tobōm, Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What do you make of all this, Professor?
dialogue.translation: Co z tym wszyjskim zrobisz, Profesorze?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm guessing this dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash!
dialogue.translation: Zdo mi sie, co tyn wymiar mo cosik jednego z turbacyjami, kere sprŏwiły nasza kraksa!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the cause of it here?
dialogue.translation: Bodej sam znojdymy ônyj powōd?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh wow! Really?
dialogue.translation: Ôch ôł! Richtich?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Well, it's just a guess. I'll need to get back to the ship before I can do any real tests...
dialogue.translation: Ja, to je ino przedłożynie. Musza wrōcić na szif, zaczym byda poradził leda jake richtich testy...

cutscene.explanation: the split paths merge, and Vitellary sees a checkpoint

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ohh! What was that?
dialogue.translation: Ôch! Co to było?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What was what?
dialogue.translation: Co to było?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That big... C thing! I wonder what it does?
dialogue.translation: To je wielge... P coś! Dziwuja sie jak to fōnguje?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Em... I don't really know how to answer that question...
dialogue.translation: Ech... Richtich niy wiym co ôdpedzieć na tyn problym...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: It's probably best not to acknowledge that it's there at all.
dialogue.translation: Bodej nojlepij bydzie, coby niy uznŏwać, co ôn ôgōlnie je.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we should take it back to the ship to study it?
dialogue.translation: Bodej trza coby my to wziyni nazŏd na szif do zbadanio.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We really shouldn't think about it too much... Let's keep moving!
dialogue.translation: Tak richtich, to niy trza nōm za wiela ô tym medykować... Robiymy dalij!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: You know, there's something really odd about this dimension...
dialogue.translation: Wiysz, je cosik richtich dziwne w tym wymiarze...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We shouldn't really be able to move between dimensions with a regular teleporter...
dialogue.translation: Niy powinnimy przełazić postrzōd wymiary bez ajnfachowy teleporter...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe this isn't a proper dimension at all?
dialogue.translation: Bodej to niy je akuratny wymiar, tak richtich?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe it's some kind of polar dimension? Something artificially created for some reason?
dialogue.translation: Bodej to je jakisik wymiar polarny? Cosik ekstra zrobiōne skuli czegoś?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I can't wait to get back to the ship. I have a lot of tests to run!
dialogue.translation: Niy poradza sie doczkać co byda nazŏd na szifie. Mōm do zrobiynio wiela testōw.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder if there's anything else in this dimension worth exploring?
dialogue.translation: Medykuja, eli je cosik wiyncyj w tym wymiarze coby było wert zbadanio?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe... but we should probably just focus on finding the rest of the crew for now...
dialogue.translation: Zdo sie... ale za tym trza nōm sie skupić na znojdziyniu reszty ekipy...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: At last!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Let's go back to the ship!
dialogue.translation: Pōdźmy nazŏd na szif!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Uch ôch...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Zajś niy!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Victoria? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Victoria? Kaj żeś je?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Pōmocy!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Strzim! Jo Cie uratuja!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Verdigris? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Verdigris? Kaj żeś je?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Strzim! Jo Cie uratuja!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vermilion? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vermilion? Kaj żeś je?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.translation: Łaaaa!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Strzim! Jo Cie uratuja!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Vitellary? Where are you?
dialogue.translation: Vitellary? Kaj żeś je?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hang on! I'll save you!
dialogue.translation: Strzim! Jo Cie uratuja!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I think I'm going to be sick...
dialogue.translation: Chyba mi niydobrze...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Zwyrto mi sie w gowie...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Phew! You're ok!
dialogue.translation: Uff! Je żeś ok!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Zwyrto mi sie w gowie...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Again! Let's go again!
dialogue.translation: Zajś! Idymy zajś!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Zwyrto mi sie w gowie...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: That was interesting, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: To było intreresantne, pra?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I feel dizzy...
dialogue.translation: Zwyrto mi sie w gowie...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: ... I hope Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: Ufōm co Verdigis je ok.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If you can find him, he'd be a big help fixing the ship!
dialogue.translation: Kej ônego znojdziesz, byłby fest pōmocny przi reparacji szifa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris is so brave and ever so smart!
dialogue.translation: Inżinier Verdigris je taki ôpowŏżny i zŏwdy taki mōndry!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Witej nazŏd, Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I think Victoria is quite happy to be back on the ship.
dialogue.translation: Miynia se, co Victoria je blank rada, co je nazŏd na szifie!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: She really doesn't like adventuring. She gets very homesick!
dialogue.translation: Ôna richtich niy je rada przigodōm. Fest sie ônyj cni za dōmym!

cutscene.explanation: only one of the last 6 strings is shown

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Vermilion called in to say hello!
dialogue.translation: Vermilion szkyrtnył coby pedzieć czejś!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Doprŏwdy niy poradzi sie doczkać aże spōmoże Ci znojś reszta ekipy!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Victoria!
dialogue.translation: Doprŏwdy niy poradzi sie doczkać aże spōmoże Ci znojś Victoria!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vitellary!
dialogue.translation: Doprŏwdy niy poradzi sie doczkać aże spōmoże Ci znojś Vitellary'ego!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Doprŏwdy niy poradzi sie doczkać aże spōmoże Ci znojś Verdigrisa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find Vermilion!
dialogue.translation: Doprŏwdy niy poradzi sie doczkać aże spōmoże Ci znojś Vermiliona!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's really looking forward to helping you find you!
dialogue.translation: Doprŏwdy niy poradzi sie doczkać aże spōmoże Ci Ciebie znojś!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Captain! You found Verdigris!
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Znôd żeś Verdigrisa!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Thank you so much!
dialogue.translation: Wielge dziynki!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'm glad Professor Vitellary is ok!
dialogue.translation: Je żech rado, co Profesor Vitellary je ok!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He had lots of questions for me about this dimension.
dialogue.translation: Mioł do mie wiela zapytań ô tyn wymiar.

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: He's already gotten to work with his research!
dialogue.translation: Już je fertich do roboty nad badaniami!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange happened when we teleported back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Dochtor Violet, cosik dziwne sie stało kej my sie teleportowali nazŏd na szif...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We got lost in another dimension!
dialogue.translation: Stracili my sie we inkszym wymiarze!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ôch niy!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Bodej tyn wymiar mo cosik ze turbacyjami, kere sprŏwiły co my sie sam roztrzaskali?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: I'll look into it...
dialogue.translation: Ciepna na to ôkym...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor! Doctor! It happened again!
dialogue.translation: Dochtor Violet! To zajś sie stało!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The teleporter brought us to that weird dimension...
dialogue.translation: Teleport przeciepoł nŏs do tego dziwnego wymiaru...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hmm, richtich dzieje sie cosik dziwne...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Keby my ino poradzili znojś zdrzōdło tych turbacyji!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor, something strange has been happening when we teleport back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Dochtor Violet, cosik dziwne sie dzieje, kej sie teleportujymy nazŏd na szif...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We keep getting brought to another weird dimension!
dialogue.translation: Durś sōm my przeciepywani do inkszego dziwnego wymiaru!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ôch niy!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Maybe that dimension has something to do with the interference that caused us to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Bodej tyn wymiar mo cosik ze turbacyjami, kere sprŏwiły co my sie sam roztrzaskali!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hmm, there's definitely something strange happening...
dialogue.translation: Hmm, richtich dzieje sie cosik dziwne...

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: If only we could find the source of that interference!
dialogue.translation: Keby my ino poradzili znojś zdrzōdło tych turbacyji!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Hey Captain! Now that you've turned off the source of the interference, we can warp everyone back to the ship instantly, if we need to!
dialogue.translation: Hej Kapitanie! Terŏzki, kej żeście ôdepli zdrzōdło turbacyji, poradzymy zarŏzki wszyjskich przeciepać nazŏd na szif, kej bydzie trza!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Any time you want to come back to the ship, just select the new SHIP option in your menu!
dialogue.translation: Kej ino bydziesz chcioł iś nazŏd na szif, ajnfach ôbier nowo ôpcyjo SZIF na swojim menu!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm an engineer!
dialogue.translation: Jo je inżinier!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I think I can get this ship moving again, but it's going to take a while...
dialogue.translation: Miynia se, co podarzi mi sie drugi rŏz sztartnōńć tyn szif, ale to kapka zetrwo...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Victoria mentioned something about a lab? I wonder if she found anything down there?
dialogue.translation: Victoria pedziała cosik|ô laboratoriōm? Medykuje eli znodła hań cosik na spodku?

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Vermilion's back! Yey!
dialogue.translation: Vermilion je nazŏd! Ja!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The Professor had lots of questions about this dimension for me...
dialogue.translation: Profesor mioł do mie wiela zapytań ô tym wymiar!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: We still don't really know that much, though.
dialogue.translation: My dalij richtich za wiela niy wiymy.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Until we work out what's causing that interference, we can't go anywhere.
dialogue.translation: Dokej sie niy dowiymy, co sprŏwio te turbacyje, niy poradzymy nikaj dojś.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I'm so glad that Violet's alright!
dialogue.translation: Tak żech je rŏd, co Violet je ok!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: That other dimension we ended up in must be related to this one, somehow...
dialogue.translation: Tyn inkszy wymiar, kaj my byli, musi być z tym pochytany, bez jakiś knif...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The antenna's broken! This is going to be very hard to fix...
dialogue.translation: Antyna je popsuto! Fest ciynżko bydzie to zreperować...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: It looks like we were warped into solid rock when we crashed!
dialogue.translation: Zdo sie, co kej my sie roztrzaśli ô fest skały!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Hmm. It's going to be hard to separate from this...
dialogue.translation: Hmm. Ciynżko bydzie sie ôd tego ôdepnōńć...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: The ship's all fixed up. We can leave at a moment's notice!
dialogue.translation: Cołki szif je zreperowany. Poradzymy ôdjechać bez kŏżdy czas!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Don't worry, Sir!
dialogue.translation: Niy starejcie sie, Panoczku!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll find a way out of here!
dialogue.translation: Znojdymy knif, jak stōnd wylyź!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I hope Victoria is ok...
dialogue.translation: Ufōm co Victoria je ok...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She doesn't handle surprises very well...
dialogue.translation: Ônyj z niyspodziankami niy idzie za fajnie...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I don't know how we're going to get this ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Niy wiym co zrobiymy, coby tyn szif był zajś sprŏwny!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Chief Verdigris would know what to do...
dialogue.translation: Inżinier Verdigris by wiedzioł co robić...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the ship to crash here?
dialogue.translation: Miynia se, co sprŏwiło iże szif roztrzaskoł sie tukej?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's the shame the Professor isn't here, huh? I'm sure he could work it out!
dialogue.translation: Żŏl, co Profesora sam niy ma, niy? Je żech zicher, coby to szafnył!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's great to be back!
dialogue.translation: Super być nazŏd!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I can't wait to help you find the rest of the crew!
dialogue.translation: Niy poradza sie doczkać, aże pōmoga Ci znojś reszta ekipy!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It'll be like old times, huh, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Bydzie jak za starych dobrych czasōw, co niy, Kapitanie?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's good to have Victoria back with us.
dialogue.translation: Fajnie, co Victoria je zajś z nami.

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: She really seems happy to get back to work in her lab!
dialogue.translation: Zdŏwo sie richtich szczynśliwo, co poradi być nazŏd we swojim laboratoriōm!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I think I saw Verdigris working on the outside of the ship!
dialogue.translation: Zdo mi sie, coch widzioł Verdigrisa kej robi na zewnyntrzu szifa!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: You found Professor Vitellary! All right!
dialogue.translation: Znod żeś Profesora Vitellary'ego! Super!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We'll have this interference thing worked out in no time now!
dialogue.translation: Bydymy gibko fertich z tymi turbacyjami!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: That other dimension was really strange, wasn't it?
dialogue.translation: Tyn inkszy wymiar był doprŏwdy dziwny, pra?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what caused the teleporter to send us there?
dialogue.translation: Dziwuja sie, co sprŏwio iże teleport nŏs hań posłoł?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Heja Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This way looks a little dangerous...
dialogue.translation: Ta drōga zdŏwo sie trocha niybezpieczno...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I'm helping!
dialogue.translation: Pōmogōm!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Hey Captain!
dialogue.translation: Hej Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I found something interesting around here - the same warp signature I saw when I landed!
dialogue.translation: Znod żech sam cosik intresantnego - jednaki ślad po zakrziwieniu, kery żech widzioł kej żech wylōndowoł!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Someone from the ship must be nearby...
dialogue.translation: Ftoś ze szifa musi być po blisku...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: This dimension is pretty exciting, isn't it?
dialogue.translation: Tyn wymiar je blank intersantny, pra?

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: I wonder what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Ciekawi mie, co znojdymy?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any signs of Professor Vitellary?
dialogue.translation: Jakeś znaki ôd Profesora Vitellary'ego?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, not yet...
dialogue.translation: Przeprŏszōm, terŏzki nic niy mom...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I hope he's ok...
dialogue.translation: Ufōm, co nic ônymu niy ma...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thanks so much for saving me, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Wielge dziynki coś mie uratowoł, Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm so glad to be back!
dialogue.translation: Tak żech je rado, coch je nazŏd!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: That lab was so dark and scary! I didn't like it at all...
dialogue.translation: To laboratoriōm było take ćmawe i ôkropiczne! Niy była żech tymu ale rada...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Vitellary's back? I knew you'd find him!
dialogue.translation: Vitellary je nazŏd? Wiedziała żech, co ônego znojdziesz...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I mean, I admit I was very worried that you wouldn't...
dialogue.translation: Miynia se, prziznŏwōm, co żech sie wiela starała, iże niy...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: or that something might have happened to him...
dialogue.translation: abo co poradziłoby ônymu sie przitrefić...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Doctor Victoria? He's ok!
dialogue.translation: Dochtor Victoria? Ôn je ok!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh! Sorry! I was just thinking about what if he wasn't?
dialogue.translation: Ôch! Przeprŏszōm! Jo myślała ino ô tym, co by było kejby niy było?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Thank you, Captain!
dialogue.translation: Dziynki, Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You found Vermilion! Great!
dialogue.translation: Znod żeś Vermiliona! Super!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I wish he wasn't so reckless!
dialogue.translation: Kejby ôn niy był taki brawurowy!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: He'll get himself into trouble...
dialogue.translation: Sōm se narobi problymōw!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Verdigris is ok! Violet will be so happy!
dialogue.translation: Verdigris je ok! Violet bydzie tako szczynśliwo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'm happy!
dialogue.translation: Je żech szczynśliwo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Though I was very worried...
dialogue.translation: Chociŏż żech sie fest tropiła...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Why did the teleporter send us to that scary dimension?
dialogue.translation: Po jakimu teleport posłoł nŏs do tego ôkropicznego wymiaru?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: What happened?
dialogue.translation: Co sie stało?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: I don't know, Doctor...
dialogue.translation: Niy wiym, Pani Dochtor...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Po jakimu?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Heya Captain!
dialogue.translation: Hej Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Are you going to try and find the rest of these shiny things?
dialogue.translation: Bydziesz prōbowoł znojś reszta tych dinksōw?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Hey Captain, I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Hej Kapitanie, znodła żech to w laboratoriōm...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Jakoś idyjo jak to fōnguje?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Sorry, I don't know!
dialogue.translation: Przeprŏszōm, niy wiym!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: They seem important, though...
dialogue.translation: Zdo sie, co sōm wŏżne...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Maybe something will happen if we find them all?
dialogue.translation: Bodej sie cosik stanie, kej ône wszyjske wysznupiymy?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Pōdź i ôbejrzij przi czym żech robiła!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It looks like these shiny things are giving off a strange energy reading!
dialogue.translation: Zdŏwo sie, co te dinksy pokŏzujōm dziwny ôdczyt ynergji!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Tōż żech to przeanalizowała...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Captain! Come have a look at what I've been working on!
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Pōdź i ôbejrzij przi czym żech robiła!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I found this in that lab...
dialogue.translation: Znodła żech ten dinks w laboratoriōm...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: It seemed to be giving off a weird energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Zdŏwało sie, co pokŏzuje dziwny ôdczyt ynergji!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: So I analysed it...
dialogue.translation: Tōż żech to przeanalizowała...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and I was able to find more of them with the ship's scanner!
dialogue.translation: ...i podarziło mi sie wysznupać ônych wiyncyj bez skaner na szifie!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: If you get a chance, it might be worth finding the rest of them!
dialogue.translation: Kej bydziesz mioł szansa, bodej je wert znojś reszta!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Don't put yourself in any danger, though!
dialogue.translation: Niy nastŏwej ale na swoje bezpieczyństwo!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...but it looks like you've already found all of them in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: ...ale zdo sie, co znod żeś już wszyjske w tym wymiarze!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Ôch? Doprŏwdy?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah, well done! That can't have been easy!
dialogue.translation: ...ale zdo sie, co znod żeś już wszyjske w tym wymiarze!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...and they're related. They're all a part of something bigger!
dialogue.translation: ...i sōm cuzamyn zepniynte. Wszyjscy sōm tajlōm czegoś wielgszego!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh? Really?
dialogue.translation: Ôch? Doprŏwdy?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Yeah! There seem to be twenty variations of the fundamental energy signature...
dialogue.translation: Ja! Zdo sie, co je dwadziścia zortōw bazowego unterszriftu ynergiji..

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Does that mean you've found all of them?
dialogue.translation: Eli to pokŏzuje, co żeś ône wszyjskie wysznupoł?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm making some fascinating discoveries, captain!
dialogue.translation: Robia pŏra super ôdkryć, kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: This isn't like any other dimension we've been to, Captain.
dialogue.translation: To niy je choby żŏdyn inkszy wymiar w kerym my byli, Kapitanie.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something strange about this place...
dialogue.translation: Je cosik dziwnego z tym placym...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain, have you noticed that this dimension seems to wrap around?
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie, daliście pozōr, co tyn wymiar zdo sie swijać?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it's strange...
dialogue.translation: Jo, to je dziwne...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like this dimension is having the same stability problems as our own!
dialogue.translation: Zdo sie, co tyn wymiar mo jednakie problymy co nasz!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope we're not the ones causing it...
dialogue.translation: Ufōm, co to niy my to sprŏwili...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: What? Do you think we might be?
dialogue.translation: Co? Miynisz se, co my to poradzili być?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: No no... that's very unlikely, really...
dialogue.translation: Niy niy... to je za wiela prŏwda, richtich...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: My guess is that whoever used to live here was experimenting with ways to stop the dimension from collapsing.
dialogue.translation: Miynia se, co leda fto sam żył, to eksperymyntowoł ze knifami jak sztopnōńć załōmanie sie wymiaru.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It would explain why they've wrapped the edges...
dialogue.translation: Ty by klarowało, po jakimu ôwinyli ranty...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Hey, maybe that's what's causing the interference?
dialogue.translation: Hej, poradzi to być powōd turbacyji?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I wonder where the people who used to live here have gone?
dialogue.translation: Ôbmiyniōm se, kaj sōm te ludzie co sam kejś żyli?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think it's no coincidence that the teleporter was drawn to that dimension...
dialogue.translation: Miynia se, co to niy je cufal, iże teleporter był przesmyczōny do tego wymiaru...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: There's something there. I think it might be causing the interference that's stopping us from leaving...
dialogue.translation: Hań cosik je. Miynia se, co to poradzi być powōd turbacyji, kere nōm niy dŏwo wylyź...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I'm glad Verdigris is alright.
dialogue.translation: Je żech rŏd, co Verdigris je ok.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It'll be a lot easier to find some way out of here now that we can get the ship working again!
dialogue.translation: Terŏzki, kej podarzi sie nōm zajś sztartnōńć tyn szif, bydzie nōm ô wiela leksij stōnd wylyź!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Ah, you've found Doctor Victoria? Excellent!
dialogue.translation: Ach, znod żeś Doktor Victoria? Super!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I have lots of questions for her!
dialogue.translation: Mōm do ônyj wiela zapytań!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Vermilion says that he was trapped in some sort of tunnel?
dialogue.translation: Vermilion gŏdo, co był zawarty we jakimś tunelu?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Yeah, it just seemed to keep going and going...
dialogue.translation: Ja, zdŏwało sie, co to durś było i było...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Interesting... I wonder why it was built?
dialogue.translation: Interesantne... Dziwuja sie czymu to było pobudowane?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's good to be back!
dialogue.translation: Fajnie je być nazŏd!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've got so much work to catch up on...
dialogue.translation: Mōm tak wiela roboty do ôdrobiynio...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I know it's probably a little dangerous to stay here now that this dimension is collapsing...
dialogue.translation: Wiym, co to je ale trocha niybezpieczne, coby sam terŏzki ôstać, kej sie tyn wymiar załōmuje...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...but it's so rare to find somewhere this interesting!
dialogue.translation: ...ale mało kej trefi sie tak, coby znojś cosik tak interesantne!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe we'll find the answers to our own problems here?
dialogue.translation: Bodej znojdymy sam ôdpedzynia na nasze problymy?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! I've been meaning to give this to you...
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Chciołbych Ci to dać...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Professor! Where did you find this?
dialogue.translation: Profesorze! Kaj żeś to znod?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh, it was just lying around that space station.
dialogue.translation: Ôch, to se ajnfach leżało na tyj kosmicznyj szteli.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It's a pity Doctor Victoria isn't here, she loves studying that sort of thing...
dialogue.translation: Żŏl, co sam niy ma doktor Victorii, ôna rada sztudiyruje take rzeczy...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Any idea what it does?
dialogue.translation: Mosz jakoś idyjo co to robi?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Nope! But it is giving off a strange energy reading...
dialogue.translation: Niy! Ale to dŏwo dziwny ôdczyt ynergji...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...so I used the ship's scanner to find more of them!
dialogue.translation: ...tōż użył żech skanera ôd szifa, coby znojś ônych wiyncyj!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...Please don't let them distract you from finding Victoria, though!
dialogue.translation: ...Prosza, niy dozwŏl coby niy dały Ci znojś Victorii!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I hope she's ok...
dialogue.translation: Ufōm, co śniōm wszyjsko ok...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Can't seem to detect any more of them nearby, though.
dialogue.translation: Ale dyć niy widza ônych wiyncyj po blisku.

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Maybe you've found them all?
dialogue.translation: Bodej żeś ône wszyjske znod?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Welcome back!
dialogue.translation: Witōmy nazŏd!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Um, where's Captain Viridian?
dialogue.translation: Hmm, kaj je Kapitan Viridian?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ... Hello?
dialogue.translation: ... Halo?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Is anyone there?
dialogue.translation: Je sam fto?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
* DIMENSIONAL STABILITY GENERATOR *
[ Currently Generating ] Maximum Stability
[ Status ] Online
READY _
dialogue.translation:
*GYNERATOR SZTABILNOŚCI WYMIAROWEJ*
[ Terŏzki Gyneruje ] Sztabilność Maximum
[ Sztatus ] Online
NARYCHTOWANY _

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Aha! This must be what's causing the interference!
dialogue.translation: Acha! To musi być powōd turbacyji!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: I wonder if I can turn it off?
dialogue.translation: Medykuja, eli śmia to wyłōnczyć?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: WARNING: Disabling the Dimensional Stability Generator may lead to instability! Are you sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation: POZŌR: Wyłōnczynie Gyneratora Sztabilności Wymiarowej poradzi kludzić do niysztabilności! Na zicher chcesz to zrobić?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
Seriously! The whole dimension could collapse! Just think about this for a minute!
Are you really sure you want to do this?
dialogue.translation:
Powŏżnie! Cołki wymiar poradziłby sie załōmać! Ino se ô tym bez chwila pomedykuj!
Na zicher chcesz to zrobić?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
DIMENSIONAL STABILISER OFFLINE
dialogue.translation:
-= POZŌR =-
SZTABILIZATOR WYMIARU OFFLINE

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Uh oh...
dialogue.translation: Uch ôch...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Any moment now...
dialogue.translation: Terŏzki bez kŏżdo chwila...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: You're alright!
dialogue.translation: Je żeś ok!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I knew you'd be ok!
dialogue.translation: Wiedzioła żech, co Ci fajnie pudzie!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: We were very worried when you didn't come back...
dialogue.translation: My sie fest starali, kej Cie niy było nazŏd...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: ...but when you turned off the source of the interference...
dialogue.translation: ...ale kej wyłōnczył żeś zdrzōdło turbacyji...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...we were able to find you with the ship's scanners...
dialogue.translation: ...podarziło sie nōm Cie znojś bez skanery ôd szifa..

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...and teleport you back on board!
dialogue.translation: ...i teleportować Cie nazŏd na pokład!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That was lucky!
dialogue.translation: Miołech szczynście!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Thanks guys!
dialogue.translation: Dziynki ekipo!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...it looks like this dimension is starting to destabilise, just like our own...
dialogue.translation: ...zdo sie, co tyn wymiar napoczyno sie desztabilizować, gynau co nasz...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: ...we can stay and explore for a little longer, but...
dialogue.translation: ...poradzymy ôstać i zwiydzać trocha dużyj, ale...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: ...eventually, it'll collapse completely.
dialogue.translation: ...na kōniec, to sie antlich blank załōmie.

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: There's no telling exactly how long we have here. But the ship's fixed, so...
dialogue.translation: Niy idzie gynau pedzieć jak dugo my sam sōm. Ale szif je zreperowany, tōż...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: ...as soon as we're ready, we can go home!
dialogue.translation: ...kej ino bydymy fertich, poradzymy iś nazŏd do dōm!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What now, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Co terŏzki, Kapitanie!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's find a way to save this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Pōdźcie znojś knif coby uratować tyn wymiar!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: And a way to save our home dimension too!
dialogue.translation: A tyż knif na uratowanie naszego dōmowego wymiaru!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: The answer is out there, somewhere!
dialogue.translation: Ôdpedzynie je kajś hań!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!
dialogue.translation: Pōdźmy!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Wow! You found all of them!
dialogue.translation: Ôł! Znod żeś ône wszyjske!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Really? Great!
dialogue.translation: Doprŏwdy? Super!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: I'll run some tests and see if I can work out what they're for...
dialogue.translation: Zrobia pora testōw i ôbejrza, eli poradza pokŏzać, do czego sōm...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: That... that didn't sound good...
dialogue.translation: To... to niy brzmiało doporzōndku...

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: Uciekać!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Oh no!
dialogue.translation: Ôch niy!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Not again!
dialogue.translation: Zajś niy!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Wait! It's stopped!
dialogue.translation: Doczkejcie! To sztopło!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: This is where we were storing those shiny things? What happened?
dialogue.translation: Tukej my trzimali te dinksy? Co sie stało?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We were just playing with them, and...
dialogue.translation: My ino śnimi grali, i...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: ...they suddenly exploded!
dialogue.translation: ...ône ôrŏz sie szpryngły!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: But look what they made! Is that a teleporter?
dialogue.translation: Ale ôboczcie, co siy zrobiło! Je to teleport?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I think so, but...
dialogue.translation: Miynia, co ja, ale...

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: I've never seen a teleporter like that before...
dialogue.translation: Nigdy przōdzij niy widzioł żech takigo teleportu...

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: We should investigate!
dialogue.translation: Trza nōm to wybadać!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: What do you think, Captain?
dialogue.translation: Co se miynisz, Kapitanie?

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Should we find out where it leads?
dialogue.translation: Trza by nōm sie wywiedzieć kaj to kludzi?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Let's go!
dialogue.translation: Pôdźmy!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: Oh no! We're trapped!
dialogue.translation: Ôch niy! Sōm my zawarci!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Oh dear...
dialogue.translation: Ôch jee...

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Hmm... how should we get out of this?
dialogue.translation: Hmm... jak trza by nōm z tego wylyź?

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.translation: SPINAĆ!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.translation: SPINAĆ!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.translation: SPINAĆ!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.translation: SPINAĆ!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.translation: SPINAĆ!

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.translation: SPINAĆ!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Or, you know... we could have just warped back to the ship...
dialogue.translation: Abo, wiycie... moglimy wrōcić na szif...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Wow! What is this?
dialogue.translation: Ôł! Co to je?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: It looks like another laboratory!
dialogue.translation: To wyglōndo choby druge laboratorium!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Let's have a look around!
dialogue.translation: Poôglōndejmy sie doôbkoła!

dialogue.speaker: purple
dialogue.english: Look at all this research! This is going to be a big help back home!
dialogue.translation: Ôbejrzij se te wszyjske badania! To bydzie fest pōmocne w dōma!

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: I wonder why they abandoned this dimension? They were so close to working out how to fix it...
dialogue.translation: Dziwuja sie, po jakimu pociepli tyn wymiar? Byli tak poblisku tego, coby coby znoś jak to zreperować...

dialogue.speaker: green
dialogue.english: Maybe we can fix it for them? Maybe they'll come back?
dialogue.translation: Bodej poradzymy to ônym zreperować? Bodej przidōm nazŏd?

dialogue.speaker: blue
dialogue.english: This lab is amazing! The scientists who worked here know a lot more about warp technology than we do!
dialogue.translation: To laboratoriōm je super! Wyuczyni, kerzy sam robili, wiedzōm ô technologiji zakrziwień wiela wiyncyj co my!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: Captain! Have you seen this?
dialogue.translation: Kapitanie! Widzioł żeś to?

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: With their research and ours, we should be able to stabilise our own dimension!
dialogue.translation: Skiż jejich badań i naszych, bydymy mogli usztabilizować nasz włŏsny wymiar!

dialogue.speaker: yellow
dialogue.english: We're saved!
dialogue.translation: Sōm my uratowani!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: Look what I found!
dialogue.translation: Ôbejrzij co żech znod!

dialogue.speaker: red
dialogue.english: It's pretty hard, I can only last for about 10 seconds...
dialogue.translation: To je doś ciynżkie, poradza strzimać ino kole 10 sekōnd...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= JUKEBOX =-
Songs will continue to play until you leave the ship.
Collect trinkets to unlock new songs!
dialogue.translation:
-= GRAJŌNCY SZRANK =-
Śpiywki bydōm puszczane aże niy wyleziesz ze szifa.
Wysznupuj dinksy, coby ôdbloknōńć śpiywki!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 5 Trinkets
Pushing Onwards
dialogue.translation:
DOLSZE ÔDBLOKNIYŃCIE: 5 Dinksōw
Pociskōmy Dalij (Pushing Onwards)

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 8 Trinkets
Positive Force
dialogue.translation:
DOLSZE ÔDBLOKNIYŃCIE: 8 Dinksōw
Pozytywno Moc (Positive Force)

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 10 Trinkets
Presenting VVVVVV
dialogue.translation:
DOLSZE ÔDBLOKNIYŃCIE: 10 Dinksōw
Prezyntujymy VVVVVV (Presenting VVVVVV)

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 12 Trinkets
Potential for Anything
dialogue.translation:
DOLSZE ÔDBLOKNIYŃCIE: 12 Dinksōw
Potyncjoł na Wszyjsko (Potential for Anything)

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 14 Trinkets
Pressure Cooker
dialogue.translation:
DOLSZE ÔDBLOKNIYŃCIE: 14 Dinksōw
Pod Presōm (Pressure Cooker)

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 16 Trinkets
Predestined Fate
dialogue.translation:
DOLSZE ÔDBLOKNIYŃCIE: 16 Dinksōw
Porynczōny Los (Predestined Fate)

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 18 Trinkets
Popular Potpourri
dialogue.translation:
DOLSZE ÔDBLOKNIYŃCIE: 18 Dinksōw
Popularne Potpourri (Popular Potpourri)

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
NEXT UNLOCK: 20 Trinkets
Pipe Dream
dialogue.translation:
DOLSZE ÔDBLOKNIYŃCIE: 20 Dinksōw
Pomarzić Idzie (Pipe Dream)

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= DZIYNNIK ÔSOBISTY =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Almost everyone has been evacuated from the space station now. The rest of us are leaving in a couple of days, once our research has been completed.
dialogue.translation: Hneda wszyjscy sōm już ewakuaowani z kosmicznyj szteli. Reszta z nŏs ôdjyżdżo za pora dni, kej nasze badania bydōm fertich.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Zapiski Badawcze =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...everything collapses, eventually. It's the way of the universe.
dialogue.translation: ... wszyjsko na kōniec sie załōmuje. Tako je drōga wszechświata.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I wonder if the generator we set up in the polar dimension is what's affecting our teleporters?
dialogue.translation: Medykuja se, eli gynerator, kery my nasztalowali na wymiar polarny, fōnguje na nasze teleporty?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: No, it's probably just a glitch.
dialogue.translation: Niy, zdo sie, co to je ino feler.

cutscene.explanation: a trinket that's difficult to get

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= PERSONAL LOG =-
dialogue.translation: -= DZIYNNIK ÔSOBISTY =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Hah! Nobody will ever get this one.
dialogue.translation: Ha! Tego żŏdyn nigdy niy dostanie.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...The other day I was chased down a hallway by a giant cube with the word AVOID on it.
dialogue.translation: ...Keregoś dnia, gōnił mie bez siyń kobel gigant z napisym UNIKEJ.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: These security measures go too far!
dialogue.translation: Te zabezpieczynia sōm za wielge!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: The only way into my private lab anymore is by teleporter.
dialogue.translation: Jedyno drōga do mojigo prywatnego laboratoriōm kludzi bez teleport.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've made sure that it's difficult for unauthorised personnel to gain access.
dialogue.translation: Postaroł żech sie, coby był ciynższy dostymp do ônych bez niyuprawniōnych robotnikōw.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Zapiski Badawcze =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... our first breakthrough was the creation of the inversion plane, which creates a mirrored dimension beyond a given event horizon ...
dialogue.translation: Naszym piyrszym przełōmym było zrobiynie płaszczyzny inwersyji, kero wyrobi zdrzadlany wymiar poza danym horyzōntym zdarzyń...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Zapiski Badawcze =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...with just a small modification to the usual parameters, we were able to stabilise an infinite tunnel!
dialogue.translation: ... kej sie ino trocha polepszyło małowŏżne parametry, byli my|w sztandzie usztabilizować niyskōńczōny tunel!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Zapiski Badawcze =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... the final step in creating the dimensional stabiliser was to create a feedback loop ...
dialogue.translation: ...finalnym krokym przi wyrobianiu sztabilizatora wymiarowego było zrobiynie pyntli sprzynżynio zwrotnego...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Zapiski Badawcze =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ...despite our best efforts, the dimensional stabiliser won't hold out forever. Its collapse is inevitable...
dialogue.translation: ...krōm naszych nojwielgszych starań, sztabilizator wymiarowy niy bydzie fōngowoł zŏwdy. Ônego załōmanie przidzie na zicher...

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: Huh? These coordinates aren't even in this dimension!
dialogue.translation: Co! Te koôrdynaty niy sōm nawet w tym wymiarze!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Personal Log =-
dialogue.translation: -= Dziynnik Ôsobisty =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... I've had to seal off access to most of our research. Who knows what could happen if it fell into the wrong hands? ...
dialogue.translation: ... musioł żech ôdetnōńć dostymp do wielgkszyj tajli naszych badań. Fto wiy co by było, kejby to sie dostało w złe rynce? ...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: -= Research Notes =-
dialogue.translation: -= Zapiski Badawcze =-

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... access to the control center is still possible through the main atmospheric filters ...
dialogue.translation: ... dostymp do cyntrum kerowanio idzie dalij mieć bez bazowe filtry atmosferyczne ...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ... it turns out the key to stabilising this dimension was to create a balancing force outside of it!
dialogue.translation: ... pokŏzało sie, co knifym do usztabilizowanio wymiaru było wyrobiynie poza ônym siły ôd rōwnowŏgi!

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Though it looks like that's just a temporary solution, at best.
dialogue.translation: Tōż zdo sie, co je to we nojlepszym przipadku wyklarowanie tymczasowe.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: I've been working on something more permanent, but it seems it's going to be too late...
dialogue.translation: Robił żech przi czymś trwolszym, ale zdo sie, co bydzie już za niyskoro...

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: ?SYNTAX ERROR
dialogue.translation: ?FELER WE SKŁADNI

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Now that the ship is fixed, we can leave anytime we want!
dialogue.translation: Terŏzki, kej szif je zreperowany, poradzymy ôdjechać kej ino chcymy!

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: We've all agreed to keep exploring this dimension, though.
dialogue.translation: Ale wszyjscy my przistoli na to, co bydymy dali badać tyn wymiar.

dialogue.speaker: player
dialogue.english: Who knows what we'll find?
dialogue.translation: Fto wiy, co wszynupiymy?

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= SHIP RADIO =-
[ Status ] Broadcasting
dialogue.translation:
-= SHIF RADIO =-
[ Sztatus ] Nadŏwanie

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= WARNING =-
The Super-Gravitron is intended for entertainment purposes only.
dialogue.translation:
-= POZŌR =-
Super Gravitrōn je ino do szpasu.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Anyone found using the Super Gravitron for educational purposes may be asked to stand in the naughty corner.
dialogue.translation: Kŏżdy fto używo Super Gravitrōnu do edukacyji, poradzi być poprŏszōny coby stył w karnyj ece.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Ship Navigation Controls
dialogue.translation:
-= D.S.S. SOULEYE =-
Kerowanie Nawigowaniym Szifa

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Error! Error! Cannot isolate dimensional coordinates! Interference detected!
dialogue.translation: Feler! Feler! Niy idzie wyôdrymbnić koôrdynatōw wymiaru! Wysznupano turbacyje!

dialogue.speaker: cyan
dialogue.english: ...oh, I've already found this.
dialogue.translation: ...ôch, jo już to znod.

dialogue.speaker: gray
dialogue.english: Please disable invincibility and/or slowdown before entering the Super Gravitron.
dialogue.translation: Prosza wyłōnczyć niyzwyciynżōnoś i/abo spomalynie przed wleziyniym do Super Gravitrōnu.
